languages.text: "Я буду счастлив{mf||а} наконец-то пообщаться с кем-то из моего круга, а не слугами и чернью".
"It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."
languages.original_text: "Я буду счастлив{mf||а} наконец-то пообщаться с кем-то из моего круга, а не слугами и чернью".

traits.locale_text: "It would be my pleasure to converse at last with someone from my own circle and not some servant or commoner."
"It would be my pleasure to converse at last with someone from my own circle and not some servant or commoner."
"It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."
"It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."
"It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."
"It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

languages.text: «Me reconfortaría tanto poder conversar con otro de igual pedigrí en lugar de un insignificante sirviente o plebeyo».
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: «Me reconfortaría tanto poder conversar con otro de igual pedigrí en lugar de un insignificante sirviente o plebeyo».

languages.text: "Es wäre so erfrischend, endlich einmal mit jemandem von gleichem Stand Konversation zu betreiben, statt mit einem niederen Diener oder Bürgerlichen."
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre so erfrischend, endlich einmal mit jemandem von gleichem Stand Konversation zu betreiben, statt mit einem niederen Diener oder Bürgerlichen."

languages.text: « Je prendrais grand plaisir à converser avec une personne de même ascendance que moi, plutôt qu'avec un vulgaire serviteur ou roturier. »
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: « Je prendrais grand plaisir à converser avec une personne de même ascendance que moi, plutôt qu'avec un vulgaire serviteur ou roturier. »

languages.text: “我终于能和与我地位相当的同辈交谈，不必再搭理那些平民和下仆了，这真是让我精神一振。”
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: “我终于能和与我地位相当的同辈交谈，不必再搭理那些平民和下仆了，这真是让我精神一振。”

languages.text: 「身分の低い使用人や庶民じゃなく、同等の血統を持つ者とようやく会話できるのは気分が良いものだ」
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: 「身分の低い使用人や庶民じゃない、れっきとした血筋の者とようやく話せて気分がいいよ」
「身分の低い使用人や庶民じゃなく、同等の血統を持つ者とようやく会話できるのは気分が良いものだ」

languages.text: "Nihayet bir hizmetçi ya da alt tabakalı yerine soylu kanıma denk biriyle sohbet edebilmek, güzel bir değişiklik olacak."
languages.original_text: "It would be so refreshing to at last converse with another of commensurate pedigree and not some lowly servant or commoner."

traits.locale_text: "Nihayet bir hizmetçi ya da alt tabakalı yerine soylu kanıma denk biriyle sohbet edebilmek, güzel bir değişiklik olacak."
